title: 怎么开死亡物品不掉落？
author: 小白不白
txt_content: 怎么开死亡物品不掉落？要指令。

replies.author: kbxxa
replies.txt_content:
开启不掉落/gamerule keepInventory true
关闭不掉落/gamerule keepInventory false

replies.author: lkr291484473
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽
